title: Oakes Irrigation Research Site: Hans Kandel - Early Planting of Soybean

tasks.task: Conduct a study on the impact of early soybean planting.
subtasks: Plant soybeans as early as possible in the planting window (first week of May).
Monitor the growth and development of the soybeans planted early.
Compare the yield difference between early-planted and late-planted soybeans.
Analyze the effect of planting date on frost susceptibility.
Investigate the relationship between soybean maturity group and yield.
Determine the optimal combination of early planting, maturity group, and other agronomic practices (e.g., seeding rate, row spacing) for maximizing yield.
Assess the role of sunlight interception in soybean yield.
